document.full_text: scientists seeking treatments for a deadly type of skin cancer say an existing arthritis drug slows the growth of melanomas and could be combined with a drug being developed by plexxikon and swiss drugmaker roche.
document.title: arthritis drug could help beat deadly skin cancer
lines_and_colors: scientists seeking treatments for a deadly type of skin cancer say an existing arthritis drug slows the growth of melanomas and could be combined with a drug being developed by plexxikon and swiss drugmaker roche.
